fields.name: DataType
fields.description: The (Azure Stream Analytics supported) data type of the function input parameter. A list of valid Azure Stream Analytics data types are described at https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn835065.aspx

fields.name: IsConfigurationParameter
fields.description: A flag indicating if the parameter is a configuration parameter. True if this input parameter is expected to be a constant. Default is false.
